topics.body:
I had a insanely interesting dream:

The dream was that I was some sort of brilliant AI programmer working on a biomechatronic android, basically a living android, but cause in the dream the program to develop living androids drew such criticism from so many people a massive terrorist attack was carried out (like nuke to the face levels of "oh shit" watching the entire complex just get blown up and such) but cause the procedure to create the android was already starting it grafted onto me and in the dream made me 100% android and 100% human at the same time.  The thing is though that in the dream cause shit hit the fan so hard at a military complex the android part was stuck in permanent defense mode; I was still me and all that, but the second anybody tried to take something off to examine it would trigger a defensive reaction cause when it happened the android part registered a massive terrorist attack so it constantly thought there was a terrorist attack underhand 24/7, but cause it was me cause personality wise I would never kill someone ever under any circumstance I would black out and wake up with the mechanic having his arms and legs broken twenty different ways but nothing severe at all.  What was eventually devised was sort of a medical coma in which I would relive the events leading up to that so that I would dream the information so they could salvage the project while it working as a sort of mental therapy at the same time.


Side note: yes I have strange dreams.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
